name: 时间之囚
summary:
What can you do when you are stuck in the prison of the time? This story may provide an answer.

The game may contain some uncomfortable plots. Please make sure you are old enough before playing this game.

Note that only Chinese is the available language. There is no English version on account of the author's limits.
info:
• 中文名: 时间之囚
  • 别名: Prison of the Time
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Visual Novel
  • 游戏引擎: Ren'Py
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2021年5月18日
  • 售价: 免费
  • 官方网站: https://vvsepr.itch.io/prisonofthetime
  • 开发: vvsepr
